CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name = "Personal", Contact__r.MailingStreet &","& Contact__r.MailingCity &","& Contact__r.MailingState &","& Contact__r.MailingPostalCode, Account__r.Business_Address__c &","& Account__r.Business_City__c &","& TEXT( Account__r.Business_State__c ) &","& Account__r.Business_Zip__c )
CustomField.label: Full Address
